longBusinessSummary: Oberoi Realty Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate development and hospitality businesses in India. It operates through The Real Estate and The Hospitality segment. The company develops and sells residential, commercial, hospitality, retail, and social infrastructure projects. It also leases office and retail spaces. In addition, the company engages in the hotel operations comprising sale of rooms, food and beverages, and allied services; construction of residential apartments; and provision of property management services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
